# Merge data
```{r}
data_2101 <- 
  read_csv("./data/2101_data.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  na.omit()

data_6360 <-
  read_csv("./data/6360_data.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  na.omit()

data <- rbind(data_2101, data_6360) %>%
  unique()
```
